name: The Robot - Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam
description:
My first game, a short platformer made for Brackeys' 2020.2 Game Jam.

How it works is that you go through the same level 4 times, with one catch. Each time you go through, your previous runs go through with you, and if you touch one of you previous runs, you die. Can you make it through all 4 runs?

Controls:

Move - [a]/[d] or [<]/[>]

Jump - [w] or [space] or [/\]

Disclaimer: This is the first game I've made, so expect many bugs, and many parts are not polished.
